text: José Augusto Martins Fernandes Pedreira (10 April 1935 - 14 October 2020) was a Portuguese Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Valença, Portugal. He was the Bishop of Viana do Castelo from 1997 to 2010. Martins Fernandes Pedreira died on 14 October 2020 in Braga, Portugal at the age of 85.Bishop José Augusto Martins Fernandes Pedreira ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Augusto Martins Fernandes Pedreira
